name: replaceable
content:

that can be replaced: Don't worry - all that stolen stuff is replaceable. electronic devices intended to run off replaceable batteries See
replace
More examplesFewer examplesThe cartridge is removable and replaceable.These workers are poorly skilled and easily replaceable.Avoid disposables by buying toothbrushes and razors with replaceable heads.
